Address.label: Address
Address.value: 425 - 1ST STREET S.W.,SUITE 200, FIFTH AVENUE PLACE, CALGARY, Alberta, T2P 3L8, Canada

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Enbridge owns extensive midstream assets that transport hydrocarbons across the U.S. and Canada. Its pipeline network consists of the Canadian Mainline system, regional oil sands pipelines, and natural gas pipelines. The company also owns and operates a regulated natural gas utility and Canada's largest natural gas distribution company. Finally, the firm has a small renewables portfolio primarily focused on onshore and offshore wind projects.

value.name: Bhushan N. Ivaturi
value.title: Chief Information Officer & Senior Vice President
